meanings.definition: A term of endearment used to address someone affectionately.
meanings.sent1: Hello, my deary, how are you today?
meanings.sent2: She is such a sweet deary, always helping others.
meanings.sent3: The little deary giggled happily as she played with her toys.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness makes her a shining deary in our community.
meanings.sent5: The old lady always had a smile for every deary she met.

meanings.definition: A person who is loved or cherished.
meanings.sent1: My grandmother is my deary, I love spending time with her.
meanings.sent2: The deary of the family, he brings joy to everyone around him.
meanings.sent3: The little deary received a big hug from her parents.
meanings.sent4: She is the deary of his heart, his one true love.
meanings.sent5: The deary of the town, known for her kindness and generosity.

meanings.definition: Expressing affection or fondness towards someone.
meanings.sent1: She gave him a deary smile, showing her love and care.
meanings.sent2: The deary gesture of holding hands warmed their hearts.
meanings.sent3: The deary note left on the fridge made him smile.
meanings.sent4: Her deary words always brought comfort to those around her.
meanings.sent5: The deary look in her eyes spoke volumes about her feelings.
